subject: Baseball
Monuments and Memorials
lead_paragraph: The Dodgers have a day off Monday, which will allow their manager, Joe Torre, to end his three-year estrangement from the Yankees to attend the monument dedication to his former boss, George Steinbrenner, at Yankee Stadium.
snippet: The Dodgers have a day off Monday, which will allow their manager, Joe Torre, to end his three-year estrangement from the Yankees to attend the monument dedication to his former boss, George Steinbrenner, at Yankee Stadium.
